archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0500
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be prompted to purchase the relevant add-on required to proceed with my chargeable activity, so that I can do what I want to do with certainty of charging

properties.value: To be discussed in details (step by step flow), how this prompt should be realized? IVR? Redirect to a webpage? Yes, this should be a prompt in a channel you are trying to use. IVR if on a call, SMS/app if Texting, (depending on if they have the app or not)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
